--- title: "Knowledge Quiz: Tutorial 1" --- ::: {.column-margin} :::: {.callout-note} - Click the check-mark button to check your answer. - Click the question-mark button to see an explanation of the solution. :::: ::: ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ::: {.webex-question } ::: {.webex-check .webex-box} Which of the following expressions generates a sequence from 1 to 5?
::: ::: {.webex-solution} * Wrong. This command will return the sequence from 1 to 5 five times. * Wrong. This command will return just a 1. * Correct. * Wrong. This command will return just a 1. * Correct. ::: ::: ::: {.webex-question } ::: {.webex-check .webex-box} What is the value of `a*b`, given this 2 vectors? $$a = 2, 1, 3 $$ $$ b = 3, 2, 5$$ ::: ::: {.webex-solution} The resulting vector is 6,2,15. ::: ::: :::
